update e_equipment
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_no = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_usage = #{unitUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_type = #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_cycle = #{unitCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit_status = #{unitStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit_clear = #{unitClear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dic_tea_attr = #{dicTeaAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update e_equipment set unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_no = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_usage = #{unitUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_type = #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_cycle = #{unitCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_status = #{unitStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_clear = #{unitClear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dic_tea_attr = #{dicTeaAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select e.id,e.unit_name unitName,e.unit_no unitNo, e.unit_usage unitUsage,u.chinese_name createUser,e.dic_tea_attr, e.unit_type unitType, e.unit_cycle unitCycle,e.status,e.img_url imgUrl,e.description,e.unit_clear unitClear from e_equipment e,s_users u where 1 = 1 AND e.create_id = u.id AND e.id = #{id}
